name: cursor-dark-extended-pin
description: Extended Cursor Dark theme with updated colors and enhanced markdown syntax highlighting

scripts.dev: echo 'Development mode: Press F5 in VS Code/Cursor to launch Extension Development Host'
scripts.install-local: npm run build:theme && rsync -av --exclude='.git' . "/mnt/c/Users/pinwa/.cursor/extensions/cursor-dark-extended-pin/" && echo 'Extension copied to Cursor extensions folder'
scripts.test: echo 'Open test-samples/ files in Extension Development Host to test theme changes'
